name: Sky Island (d4m109)
description:
Welcome to Sky Island!

This is my first game project for learning purposes of game development and UE4. The game was created using only free asset from various sources:
- UE4 Assets including Paragon and Infinity Blade: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/store
- Ryzom Assets: https://atys.wiki.ryzom.com/wiki/Category:Ryzom_assets

I hope you enjoy it!

Goal: 
Explore the Island and find the hidden coins!

Controls (Mouse+Keyboard OR Gamepad):
W/A/S/D - Move
Spacebar - Jump
Tab - Toggle between Combat/Travel mode
Shift (Travel mode) - Sprint
LMB (Combat mode) - Attack
LMB + W (Combat mode) - Attack Forward
RMB (Combat mode) - Block

ESC/ M - Menu
